attributes.action: allow previous years unused ISA allowances to be used retrospectively up to a limit of 6 years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present investors are allowed a maximum investment per year in tax free ISA's; if not used within the tax year the allowance is lost for that year.  Certain income tax allowances can be set off against previous years tax so why not allow unused ISA allowances to be used retrospectively? 
The government says it wants us to save, so let us have more incentive to do so particularly in this time of low interest rates.
